commit.message: Provide proper error message if JAVA_HOME is invalid on Windows

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            echo "Invalid JAVA_HOME. The system cannot find the path specified" 1>&2
          
          
            
            echo "Invalid JAVA_HOME. The system cannot find the specified path." 1>&2
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,13 +39,17 @@ if exist %BALLERINA_HOME%\..\..\dependencies\jdk8u202-b08-jre (
 )
 
 if "%JAVA_HOME%" == "" goto noJavaHome
-if not exist "%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java.exe" goto noJavaHome
+if not exist "%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java.exe" goto invalidJavaHome
 goto checkServer
 
 :noJavaHome
 echo "You must set the JAVA_HOME variable before running Ballerina."
 goto end
 
+:invalidJavaHome
+echo "Invalid JAVA_HOME. The system cannot find the path specified" 1>&2

commit.message:
Update error message for invalid JAVA_HOME

Co-Authored-By: praneesha <praneesha@wso2.com>
